title: more people scripting recently?
body:
Anyone else noticing it? In the past week I've had more people scripting in my games than I have had since I'd started playing...

edit: there's also no way to report them in-game

thnx rito

replies.body:
It's all in the minds eye.
Scripting gives you an unfair edge that allows you to beat players you otherwise wouldn't beat. The downside to scripting is, it limits the possible skill that you as a player may posses, while letting other players adapt to a "perfect player."

tl;dr : Beating scripters levels up your skill level.
I haven't noticed anything recently, however we may have different matchmaking.

This:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/VENy3Brf-how-to-script-inconspiciously

Where they use scripts (kind of like programs) to play the game perfectly for them. Cheating, essentially.
